modName: Thieves Guild Armor Retex - Dirty black with plated shoulder
summary: Thieves Guild Armor Retex - Dirty black with plated shoulders
descriptionHtml:
All credit goes to this http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1996

Extract to Skyrim directory

First upload and mod. I took what they did and made it for males. Also, mucked with the shoulders a bit more. The plate is now buckled to a leather base, the top shoulder guard now has the same texture as others.

Plan on doing the same for the wrist guards. 

If anyone wants to tell me how they did the brown bleed through on female version that would be great. Improve on this if you want just make sure you send me a link. The highlights and smaller details maybe fixed later.
author: Proponent
